title: Sash, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk on cotton
Technique: uncounted stitches; satin and double running stitches on plain weave; foundation has a crepe effect due to over twisted z-spun yarns used for warp and weft
description: Sash with identical ten inch high embroidered border at each end. The border consists of two five-inch wide repeats of a flowering plant in shades of red, green, blue and metallic silver. The lower border, about one inch high, is a three-inch repeat of a curving vine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sash, 19th century.Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk on cotton
Technique: uncounted stitches; satin and double running stitches on plain weave; foundation has a crepe effect due to over twisted z-spun yarns used for warp and weft. 1974-76-5.
